alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:02PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oglala Lakota and southwestern Bennett Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 401 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Manderson, or 15 miles north of Pine Ridge, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Porcupine, Manderson, Allen, Wounded Knee, Batesland, Goose Neck Housing, Wakpamni, Swett, Evergreen, Porcupine Butte Housing, southern Yellow Bear Canyon and southern Pine Ridge Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern South Dakota.
